title: january 27: founding a foundation
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the founding of the National Geographic Society and how the society went on to develop the iconic magazine. Afterwards, she talks about an awards season controversy. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
